Method new()

Create a new Esvee object.

Usage

Esvee$new(path = NULL, files_tbl = NULL)

Arguments

path

(character(1))
Output directory of tool. If files_tbl is supplied, this basically gets ignored.

files_tbl

(tibble(n))
Tibble of files from list_files_dir.

Method parse_prepfraglen()

Usage

x

(character(1))
Path to file.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Esvee$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
path <- here::here(
  "nogit"
)
sv <- Esvee$new(path)
sv$tidy()
sv$tbls$tidy |>
  purrr::set_names(sv$tbls$parser) |>
  purrr::map(\(x) x[["data"]][[1]])
} # }
